price: Wer also nach alledem gegen Allah (noch) Lügen ersinnt, jene sind die Ungerechten.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
